item.description:
Hello Java Programmers,
let's talk, Java events. Sun is holding the Sun Tech Days Boston, Sept 11-12. Do you attend such events? What are your objectives? What was the best you got our of such an event?

I look forward to seeing you all.

Our meetings are personal, engaging and everybody is sharing in the topic at hand. Come and share your experience with your peers. Our new venue is "Middlesex Lounge" Cambridge.

Kaj
P.S.: Thank you to the many members that RSVP (one way or another). This helps your humble organizer to manage the crowd at the venue.
item.name: The Boston Java September Meetup
